text: aur ye hai ki apane paalanahaar se kshama yaachana karo, phir usee kee or dhyaanamagn ho jao. vah tumhen ek nirdhaarit avadhi tak achchha laabh pahunchaega aur pratyek shreshth ko usakee shreshthata pradaan karega aur yadi tum munh pheroge, to main tumapar ek bade din kee yaatana se darata hoon
